articles.title: 是什么成就了发明家特斯拉
articles.description: 原文标题：《是什么成就了特斯拉》想象一个没有电灯、电机、电泵、电扇、冰箱或者电梯的世界。如果没有微波，就没有收音机或电视。下次当你按下开关时，你应该想一想尼古拉・特斯拉（Nikola Tesla）。特斯拉比其他任何一位发明家都更有资格说自己开创了电力时代。但在他去世 70 年后，在他的那些主要发明问世一个世纪后，他的名字并不像托马斯・爱迪生、亚历山大・格雷厄姆・贝尔或莱特兄弟那样为人所熟知。特斯拉不安于现状的大脑使他可以进一步超越这些在电力和机械方面的创新。他发明了一种“放大线圈”，它可以大幅度提高电流的频率和电…

articles.author: gglover@insider.com (George Glover)
articles.title: Chinese leader Xi Jinping's power grab fueled a $6 trillion stock selloff and the yuan's decline. These 4 charts capture the market meltdown.

articles.title: Twitter, Facebook, other social media cos will have to abide by local laws: Minister
articles.description: STATE TIMES NeWS New Delhi: The new amendments to IT rules impose a legal obligation on social media companies to take all out efforts to prevent barred content and misinformation, the government said on Saturday making it clear that platforms such as Twitter…

articles.author: Business Standard
articles.title: Elon Musk to remodel Twitter with plans to cut off employees: Report
articles.description: Elon Musk has started to reform Twitter policies and is wasting no time remodeling it by cutting off employees, and introducing plans for a council to determine content decisions, The Hill reported
articles.content: After closing the USD 44 billion acquisition deal on Thursday, Elon Musk has started to reform the policies of the micro-blogging platform and is wasting no time remodeling it by cutting off employee… [+2706 chars]

articles.author: Peter Valdes-dapena
articles.title: Tesla Cyberquad recall: Radio Flyer ATV for kids recalled for violating safety standards; owners can be reimbursed for cost
articles.description: The "toy" version, which cost $1,900, quickly sold out when it was offered for sale in December 2021. The toy was designed to go as fast as 10 miles an hour.
articles.content: The Tesla Cyberquads for Kids, made by Radio Flyer, has been recalled because it doesn't meet federal safety standards. Owners are being offered a full refund after they disable the electric all-terr… [+2407 chars]
